description.narrative: Huairou Commission is a global membership-and partnerkoalition working with women on a grassrootlevel, aiming to make concrete improvements on a local level and to strengthen womens collective power on a global level. The organizatiopn works with several issues, one of them is within climate and resilience and disaster risk reduction. This support is to implementation of their strategic plan for 2015-2020.

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation

description.narrative: Årsrapporten, finansiella redovisningen och revisionen 2019 inkommer den 31 augusti 2020 och är försenad pga. covid-19-pandemin (vilket Sida godkänt).
